faqs.question: What are the different bundle plans available and how much do they cost?
faqs.answer:
Bundle plans include subscriptions to either Disney+ and Hulu, or Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+, at discounted prices, as compared to the retail price of each subscription when purchased separately. View more plans [here](#).

Choose between the following bundle plans:

- **Disney+, Hulu Bundle Basic** for **$2.99/mo. for 4 mos.**, which includes **Disney+ (With Ads) and Hulu (With Ads)**
- **Disney+, Hulu Bundle Premium** for **$19.99/month**, which includes **Disney+ (No Ads) and Hulu (No Ads)**
- **Disney+, Hulu, ESPN+ Bundle Basic** for **$16.99/month**, which includes **Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN+ (With Ads)**
- **Disney+, Hulu, ESPN+ Bundle Premium** for **$26.99/month**, which includes **Disney+ (No Ads), Hulu (No Ads), and ESPN+ (With Ads)**

*Ads will be served in select live and linear content.*

_Not combinable with any free trial or other promotional offers or pricing (including a bundle); not redeemable via gift card. Any plan switch after redemption of this offer will result in forfeiture of the discount pricing._

Access content from each service separately. Location data may be required to watch certain content. Select Hulu content is available via Disney+ with valid Disney+ and Hulu subscriptions; additional content is only available via the Hulu app. Hulu content can be streamed via Disney+ on up to 2 devices simultaneously. Additional app features and device restrictions apply. For more information, including billing and cancellation details, please visit the Hulu Help Center.

faqs.question: What content can I watch with the bundle plans?
faqs.answer: With your bundle plan, there is something for everyone! With Disney+, you get new releases, classics, series, and Originals from the creators at Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and Nat Geo. With Hulu, you can enjoy current hits, comfort classics, award-winning originals, and movies everyone is talking about. And with ESPN+, you can stream live sports, thousands of live events, top leagues and tournaments, ESPN+ Originals, and the complete 30 for 30 Library. Plus, get exclusive access to premium articles, fantasy tools, and archives.

faqs.question: How do I sign up for a bundle plan?
faqs.answer: You can sign up for a bundle plan by visiting our official website and selecting the plan that suits you best.

faqs.question: If I have an existing Hulu subscription, can I still sign up for a bundle through Hulu?
faqs.answer: Yes. Existing subscribers to any Hulu plan who are billed by Hulu* can sign up for a bundle through Hulu by visiting the Manage Account page.*At this time, you are not eligible to sign up for a bundle through Hulu if you are billed for your Hulu subscription through a third party (e.g. Sprint, Spotify, Apple iTunes, Roku) or if you subscribe pursuant to a promotional offer. You may be eligible to sign up for a bundle through Disney+.

faqs.question: Where can I watch bundle content?
faqs.answer: After signing up for a bundle plan of your choice, download the Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN apps separately to access each service and stream across your favorite devices and platforms, including TV, computer, mobile and game consoles. Most ESPN+ content is also available to stream in the Hulu app. See here for a more detailed list of supported devices. Devices supported by Hulu Devices supported by Disney+ Devices supported by ESPN+

faqs.question: Which premium add-ons are available with a Hulu subscription?
faqs.answer: You can add HBO®, SHOWTIME®, Cinemax®, or STARZ® to your Hulu subscription for additional monthly subscription fees.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription to a bundle anytime online or by calling us.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial for a bundle?
faqs.answer: No, there is no free trial.

faqs.question: I’m under 18. Can I sign up for a bundle?
faqs.answer: No. The bundle is only available to customers 18 and older.

faqs.question: If I live outside the U.S., can I sign up for a bundle?
faqs.answer: No. The bundle is currently available to residents of the United States or certain U.S. territories.
